original_title: Notice to teachers who have completed their service by December 31, 2021
original_body_lines: All teachers who have completed their service by Dember 31, 2021 and have received transfer letters should report to their workplaces by June 12 (Monday), the Education Ministry announced.
If a teacher wishes to appeal, the principal may forward the appeal to the Teacher Transfer Division after the teacher reports for duty.
It is not necessary to visit the Teacher Transfer Department of the Education Ministry in person in this regard.
Appeal decisions on appealable applications will be notified promptly. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
